channel.title: Projects on FalconBlog
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on FalconBlog

item.title: Day 27
item.description:
📅 June 27, 2025 – Friday

  • 📝 Drafted Meeting Agenda: Prepared a detailed agenda for the weekly project meeting to ensure structured discussions and progress tracking.
  • 👥 Held Project Meeting: Participated in the scheduled weekly team meeting. Discussed development milestones, upcoming deadlines, and stereo setup improvements.
  • 🔍 Refined Stereo Setup: Continued work on the stereo vision system. Generated another round of depth maps and observed inconsistencies that require calibration and tuning.
  • 📈 Evaluation: Depth map accuracy still not optimal — identifying areas where disparity and baseline adjustments are needed.

The meeting helped align the team, and tomorrow’s focus will be on hardware tweaks and deeper debugging of stereo output.

item.title: Day 26
item.description:
📅 June 26, 2025 – Thursday

  • 🧾 Drafted Project Tasks: Structured and documented the tasks for each project member for the upcoming week to ensure clarity and accountability.
  • 🛠️ Worked on Project Modules: Continued working on the assigned modules, focused on stability and testing edge cases.
  • 🤖 Stereo Setup Progress: Successfully set up the stereo camera system and obtained a preliminary depth map output.
  • 🧪 Experimental Analysis: Validated the quality of the generated depth data; began planning improvements to enhance mapping precision.

The stereo mapping pipeline is finally shaping up. Tomorrow’s goal is to fine-tune the accuracy and integrate it with navigation systems.

item.title: Day 25
item.description:
📅 June 25, 2025 – Wednesday

  • 🧠 Codeforces Practice (8:30–9:30 AM): Solved 3 problems from the problemset to sharpen competitive programming skills.
  • 🤖 Built FalconBot (9:30–10 AM): Created my first Telegram bot, a mini utility tool – FalconBot.
  • 🍽️ Breakfast (10:00–10:30 AM): Took a quick recharge break.
  • 🔐 Google CTF – Crypto (10:30–12:30 PM): Solved the Blinders challenge from Google CTF 2024 – a fun and tricky crypto problem.
  • 🔑 OpenAI Router & API Keys (12:30–1:30 PM): Experimented with routing requests and managing API keys for future automation tools.
  • 🤝 Project Collaboration (1:30–2:30 PM): Helped teammates with their tasks and contributed to active modules.
  • 🍛 Lunch (2:30–3:00 PM): Refueled with lunch.
  • 🎓 NPTEL Lectures (3:00–5:00 PM): Studied selected NPTEL content to enhance foundational understanding.
  • 🍪 Snack Break (5:00–5:30 PM): Quick refreshment.
  • 🏥 Hospital Visit & Shopping (5:30–6:30 PM): Took care of essentials and quick shopping.
  • 😌 Loafing (6:30–8:00 PM): Took time to relax and mentally recharge.
  • 📞 Project Meet (8:00–10:30 PM): Long call with project lead; reviewed progress, restructured plans, and reassigned roles.

A jam-packed day blending tech, productivity, and self-care.

item.title: Day 8
item.description:
🚀 June 8, 2025 – Sunday

  • Attended First Ever CP Contest: Participated in my first competitive programming contest. It was a thrilling experience that gave me insight into real-time problem-solving under pressure.
  • Documented the Experience on GitHub: Made a log of the contest, what I solved, and what I learned. This helps track progress and reflect on areas for improvement.
  • Project Tenure as Co-Lead Begins: Officially stepped into the role of project Co-Lead. Started organizing initial thoughts and planning out the first steps for the new responsibilities.
